articles.title: Russia-Ukraine war: West says Putin ‘being misled’ by advisers - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: US, UK and European officials say Putin is being ‘misinformed’ about his military’s poor performance in Ukraine.
articles.content: Russian President Vladimir Putin is being misled by advisers who are afraid to tell him the truth about the Russian militarys performance in Ukraine and the effect of Western sanctions on Russias eco… [+4575 chars]

articles.title: More than 4 million have fled Russia’s ‘senseless’ war on Ukraine, says UN - The Guardian
articles.description: Speed and scale of refugee crisis unprecedented in Europe since WW2, says UN refugees commissioner
articles.content: More than 4 million people have fled Russias utterly senseless war on Ukraine, the United Nations has said, as the Kremlin played down hopes of an early breakthrough a day after peace talks between t… [+4692 chars]
